name: create-local-app
description: A powerful Go-based scaffolding tool for TrueBlocks/Wails desktop applications

scripts.build: touch VERSION && go build -o bin/create-local-app main.go
scripts.deploy: yarn build && cp bin/create-local-app /usr/local/bin/ && echo '✅ Installed to /usr/local/bin/create-local-app' && which create-local-app && echo '✅ Installation verified'

author: TrueBlocks
